ruling: - You cannot activate [[Dark Bribe]] if your opponent has no cards remaining in their Deck.

- If your opponent activates a Spell or Trap Card outside of their Draw Phase (Chain Link 1) and you negate its activation and effect with [[Dark Bribe]] (Chain Link 2), after your opponent draws a card with the effect of [[Dark Bribe]] you can activate [[Appropriate]], because the activation of your opponent's Spell or Trap Card is negated by [[Dark Bribe]].
